extendedInfo.description: This application is to set color value of R(Red), G(Green), B(Blue) with control bar , and show the color combined.This is useful for designer to communicate colors.This is convenient for graphic designer or cartoonist who use PhotoShop or Illustrator or etc.This is free-version for Color Research but with ad.There is non-ad + donation version.I have difficulty with translating this explanation. Hence, if you find some errors(application) or grammatical errors, feel free to send me an e-mail.(xoghks22ek@naver.com)[Update History]ver.1.2.1 : First version   Full Screen, detail control Button, Share, Save OK
